snippet: Without offering new policy details, the president used a White House meeting to rebuild his relationship with business leaders.
abstract: Pres Obama meets with chief executive officers, seeking their support as he prepares to negotiate with Congressional Republicans over fiscal impasse, but does not offer new policy details; he has fence-mending to do before he can count on any serious backing from business community.

byline.original: By HELENE COOPER and NELSON D. SCHWARTZ
byline.contributor: Helene Cooper reported from Washington and Nelson D. Schwartz from New York. Jackie Calmes contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Without offering new policy details, the president used a White House meeting to rebuild his relationship with business leaders.

headline.main: Obama Meets C.E.O.’s as Fiscal Reckoning Nears
headline.print_headline: Obama Meets C.E.O.’s as Fiscal Reckoning Nears
